Review Name: Nice product Review Description: Lg 1.5 ton 3 star window ac is one of the few inverter window ac available. This is a very sleek ac which cools fast and almost without any noise. The delivery by Ekart was very quick and on schedule. However the installation by LG brand authorised technicians was very bad. They arrived after 7 hrs after multiple calls. The installation was done but the Demo was ABSOLUTELY NOT DONE. The technician didn't even tell how to clean the air filter and instead said just use the remote to clean the filter. I had to search You Tube for process of cleaning the filter.
